actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the tax exemption of certain charitable organizations and the allowance of a deduction for contributions to such organizations shall not be construed as the provision of Federal assistance.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the tax-exempt status of certain charitable organizations and the allowance of a deduction for contributions to such organizations shall not be construed as the provision of Federal assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the tax exemption of certain charitable organizations and the allowance of a deduction for contributions to such organizations shall not be construed as the provision of Federal assistance.
